name: What Can You Do
description:
This is a little high score, bullet hell, arcade styled game, where you have abilities but there is not enough place for all of them, choose carefully!

also.. theres a bug with the dashing which i didnt have time to fix :(

ps: this is my first "finished" game(ill work on it more after the jam) so I hope youll like it! pls lmk what you think
